content: Our patent is now officially in the review queue. It's a waiting game, but we're using this time to make our tech even stronger.
User feedback has been gold. We're now working on privacy controls that let users feel secure, yet part of a larger conversation. It's a tricky dance, but we're learning the steps.
The AI-human intuition experiment is showing promising results. Traders are feeling more in control, and our AI is learning when to step in. It's a partnership, not a takeover.
The patent is now in the hands of the reviewers. While we wait, we're focusing on making our social platform a space where people can connect, not just consume.
Our team's been on a roll with the social platform. We're refining content moderation to strike the right balance between freedom of expression and community safety.
Just had a family dinner where my sister was all about how our AI-human hybrid tech could revolutionize learning. It's wild to see how our work is sparking ideas everywhere.
